Name: Oliver's Adventures in the Fairyland
About the game: A small adventure metroidvania game, where you playing as our-time teenager, who was summoned by wizard in fantasy world! And that wizard gave him a quest - return stolen king's treasures! GAME FEATURES - There's no autosaves or custom saves, you can save your progress only near checkpoints - Open world! You can go wherever you want (and can, surely, he-he-he) in this dungeon - A lot of upgrades, that can help you open new parts on dungeon and make you way easily - BIG BOSSES! - Retro style (pixel art and 8-bit music) - Tons of secrets! - Only awesome gameplay! No boring dialogues! No stupid empty rooms! No hard lvl-up systems and anything like that! ONLY! AWESOME! GAMEPLAY!
